subject: Web3
title: Domain Name NFTs
description: A 60-second lesson on Domain Name NFTs.

hook.text: Traditional domains are rented from registrars. Blockchain domains are NFTs you own forever with no renewal fees.

buildup.text: Unstoppable Domains and ENS sell .crypto, .eth, and .wallet domains as NFTs on the blockchain.

discovery.text: A blockchain domain doubles as a wallet address. Send crypto to 'yourname.eth' instead of a 42-character string.

twist.text: Regular browsers can't resolve blockchain domains without plugins. Adoption requires mainstream browser support.

climax.text: If browsers adopt them, blockchain domains could disrupt the entire $400 billion domain industry.

punchline.text: Own your domain forever. No registrar. No renewal fees.

quiz.question: How are blockchain domains different from traditional ones?
options: They're NFTs you own permanently with no renewal fees
